reviewText: Sam Brown is my favorite travel show host. She is great at showing not just the sites, but the food and people as well. Sometimes that's the best part of the area! I love all Sam Brown DVDs
Title: N/A

reviewText: I love Samantha Brown and would give 5 stars to all her other shows but I found the Great Weekends series too quick and too sparse for my liking. Granted, it is just a weekend, but this series is more enjoyable if you have already been to those cities and would like to see it in a whole new light. With this show, she hardly does the more touristy locations and instead finds the "flipside" of that city. For example, when she went to Los Angeles, she didn't go to Beverly Hills or Santa Monica, she went instead to the Forever Cemetery and Venice Beach-- still touristy locales but far from a must-see. For a more comprehensive tour of that city, watch her other "Passport" shows.
summary: If you've been to these places already...
